means: 木犀草，灰绿色，有花样的手编花边

sentence.Network_en: The perfume of mignonette had departed.
sentence.Network_cn: 木犀草香味已杳然消失.

sentence.Network_en: Old World genus of herbs having racemose flowers: mignonette; dyer's rocket.
sentence.Network_cn: 旧大陆一个草本属,总状花序; 木犀草; 淡黄木犀草.

sentence.Network_en: And once I played marbles when I went to that old dame's school, she liked mignonette.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我在那位年迈的女老师开的学校就读时,也曾玩过弹珠儿, 她喜爱木樨草.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... mignon 可爱的 mignonette 木犀草 migraineur 偏头痛患者.
理查德-帕克可能更有意思：1884年，“木犀草号”（Mignonette）游艇沉没，4个幸存者坐上了救生船，被困大西洋，除了船长Thomas …

list.abs: 它也称为木樨草树（mignonette tree）和埃及女贞（Egyptian privet）。生长在佛罗里达和加利福尼亚的指甲花被当成一种观赏植物。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French mignonnette, diminutive of mignon 'small and sweet'

means.word_mean: 1. Mediterranean woody annual widely cultivated for its dense terminal spikelike clusters greenish or yellowish white flowers having an intense spicy fragrance
